About

I am a recent graduate of Flatiron School in DC. My background is in business ownership in the hospitality and entertainment industry. I became a fullstack developer out of a desire to do something more fulfilling while allowing me to be creative and challenged on a daily basis. As an entrepreneur, I chose coding because I enjoy building new things and constantly learning. I have always been a self-starter and this new journey will be the greatest start of my life! When I’m not honing my coding skills and learning new frameworks, I enjoy cooking and exercising. My technical skills are listed below:

  • Javascript
  • React
  • Ruby
  • Rails
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • SQL
  • PostgreSQL

Get In Touch

I am currently seeking Software Engineering oppurtunities in the DC, Maryland and Virginia area as well as remote positions. I am open to full-time, part-time and contract work. Please feel free to reach out about employment oppurtunities or to simply say hi! 😊

Movie Buff

Calorie Bookie

GitHub Frontend | Github Backend

React application with Ruby on Rails Backend. Reat Hooks was used to mange state and PostgreSQL for the database. Integrated Nutritionix API for food data.
